suppress.notes: Declared as False positive on library com.nimbusds:lang-tag #3594 https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/3594 CVE-2020-23171 Reference https://tools.hmcts.net/jira/browse/CCD-1870
We do not use: Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE + Spring Security (any version), see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258 False positive confirmed.

These CVE's are coming from Dhowden tag library and it impacts only MP3/MP4/OGG/FLAC metadata parsing library. Also it is declared as false positive in https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/3043
